SELECT count(*) FROM CHAT_ROOM cr JOIN recruit_board rcb ON cr.recruit_seq = rcb.recruit_seq WHERE rcb.group_mem_seq = #{groupMemSeq}

SELECT vp.volun_proceed_seq, vp.recruit_seq, rb.recruit_title, rb.count, rb.mem_count, vp.mem_seq, m.name, vp.state, vp.end_date FROM volunteer_proceed vp JOIN member m ON vp.mem_seq = m.mem_seq JOIN recruit_board rb ON vp.recruit_seq = rb.recruit_seq WHERE vp.group_mem_seq = #{groupMemSeq} AND vp.state = '신청중' ORDER BY vp.recruit_seq ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM volunteer_proceed WHERE RECRUIT_SEQ = #{recruitSeq} AND STATE = '승인'

SELECT vp.volun_proceed_seq, vp.recruit_seq, rb.recruit_title, vp.mem_seq, m.name, vp.state FROM volunteer_proceed vp JOIN member m ON vp.mem_seq = m.mem_seq JOIN recruit_board rb ON vp.recruit_seq = rb.recruit_seq WHERE vp.group_mem_seq = #{groupMemSeq} AND vp.state = '승인' AND vp.end_date BETWEEN trunc(sysdate) AND trunc(sysdate) + 1 ORDER BY vp.volun_proceed_seq DESC

SELECT vp.volun_proceed_seq, vp.recruit_seq, rb.recruit_title, vp.mem_seq, m.name, vp.reject_message, vp.state FROM volunteer_proceed vp JOIN member m ON vp.mem_seq = m.mem_seq JOIN recruit_board rb ON vp.recruit_seq = rb.recruit_seq WHERE vp.group_mem_seq = #{groupMemSeq} AND vp.state = '거절' AND vp.end_date BETWEEN TRUNC(sysdate) AND TRUNC(sysdate) + 1 ORDER BY vp.volun_proceed_seq desc
